skills.name: Glistening Light
skills.description: Jing Yuan deals Lightning DMG equal to {1}% of his ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Rifting Zenith
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG equal to {1}% of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by 2 for the next turn.

skills.name: Lightbringer
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG equal to {1}% of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by 3 for the next turn.

skills.name: Prana Extirpated
skills.description: Summons Lightning-Lord at the start of the battle. Lightning-Lord has 60 base SPD and 3 base Hits Per Action. When the Lightning-Lord takes action, its hits are considered as follow-up attacks, with each hit dealing Lightning DMG equal to {1}% of Jing Yuan's ATK to a random single enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also receive Lightning DMG equal to 25% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. The Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action can reach a max of 10. Every time Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action increases by 1, its SPD increases by 10. After the Lightning-Lord's action ends, its SPD and Hits Per Action return to their base values. When Jing Yuan is knocked down, the Lightning-Lord will disappear. When Jing Yuan is affected by Crowd Control debuff, the Lightning-Lord is unable to take action

skills.name: Spirit Invocation
skills.description: After the Technique is used, the Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action in the first turn increases by 3 at the start of the next battle.

eidolons.name: Slash, Seas Split
eidolons.description: When Lightning-Lord attacks, the DMG multiplier on enemies adjacent to the target enemy increases by an extra amount equal to 25% of the DMG multiplier against the target enemy.

eidolons.name: Swing, Skies Squashed
eidolons.description: After Lightning-Lord takes action, DMG caused by Jing Yuan's Basic ATK, Skill, and Ultimate increases by 20% for 2 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Strike, Suns Subdued
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Spin, Stars Sieged
eidolons.description: For each hit performed by the Lightning-Lord when it takes action, Jing Yuan regenerates 2 Energy.

eidolons.name: Stride, Spoils Seized
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Sweep, Souls Slain
eidolons.description: Each hit performed by the Lightning-Lord when it takes action will make the target enemy Vulnerable. While Vulnerable, enemies receive 12% more DMG until the end of the Lightning-Lord's current turn, stacking up to 3 time(s).
